attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like many other people I'm getting a little fed up with being given a new petition to sign everyday.
Seeing as nobody takes any notice of them anyway, could you please sign my petition to stop people creating more of the dam things.
Thanks I'm sure with your support we can bring an end to these petitions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
